pullRequest.title: [Exam] Enhancements for student exam generation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Server: I added multiple integration tests (Spring) related to the features
 Server: I added @PreAuthorize and check the course groups for all new REST Calls (security)
 Server: I implemented the changes with a good performance and prevented too many database calls
 Server: I documented the Java code using JavaDoc style.
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Description

 Show confirmation dialog before the generation of student exams, if some student exams already exist
 Added button, which only creates individual exams for students who don't have one yet
 Added status indicator for student exams, which shows whether individual exams exist for all registered students. Thanks @sascha11110 for helping with the styling.
 Extended delete dialog of students for an exam. The associated student exam will also be deleted. Additionally the instructor has the option to also delete associated participations and submissions.

Steps for Testing


Create an exam and properly set it up with some exercises
Register students for the exam
Go to the student exam page
--> Warning should be shown that not all registered students have an exam
Click on 'Generate individual exams'
--> No dialog shoud open. Right amount of exams should be created. Status should turn green. Check the individual exams
Click again on 'Generate individual exams'
--> Dialog should open, prompting for a confirmation
Add more students to the exam
Move back to the student exam page
--> Warning state should be displayed
Click on 'Generate missing individual exams'
--> Right amount of individual exams should be created. State should turn green. Check the newly created individual exams
Click again on 'Generate missing individual exams'
--> 0 exams should be created
Create participations by clicking on 'Prepare exercise start'
Unregister a student from the exam. Select the option with participations.
Move back to the student exam page
--> Exam of the student should be deleted. State should be green.

Screenshots



New generate student exam dialog, shown when some student exams already exist

Extended delete student from exam dialog

All students have an exam (or no registered users)

Not all students have an exam

commit.message: Refactor student exam generation validation
Refactor generateStudentExams service method to enable reuse of functionality. Add new REST resource for creation of missing individual exams
Add service method for the creation of missing student exams
Add button for creation of missing student exams
Show modal to confirm generation of student exams if some already exist
Display status of student exam generation
Enhance layout
Delete student exam when a student is unregistered from the exam. Optionally, delete his participations and submissions in the exam.
Extend delete student from exam dialog
Merge branch 'enhancement/exam-mode/student-exam-generation' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into enhancement/exam-mode/student-exam-generation
Merge branch 'develop' into enhancement/exam-mode/student-exam-generation
Fix deletion of student from exam if student exam does not exist
Merge branch 'enhancement/exam-mode/student-exam-generation' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into enhancement/exam-mode/student-exam-generation
Improve wording of dialog
Use optional instead of catch EntityNotFoundEx

nodes.bodyText:
I believe it would be useful if the button Generate missing individual exams is only clickable/visible if there are students without exams.
As you already track that, this should be quite simple to do, right?
